    • メソッドの詳細

      • init

        public void init()
        Called at app is launching. Override this to implement custom initialization. If you override this method, you must call super.init().

      • update

        public void update(FrameInput frame)
        Called at every frame update. It will be called about 60 times per frame. If you override this method, you must call super.update(frame).
        パラメータ:
        frame - Frame information

      • setScene

        public void setScene(Scene scene)

      • getScene

        public Scene getScene()

      • getContext

        public android.content.Context getContext()
        Get Context.
        戻り値:
        context

      • runOnGlThread

        public void runOnGlThread(java.lang.Runnable command)
        Enqueue command that must run in GL thread. This command will be executed at next update.
        パラメータ:
        command - Command

      • runOnUiThread

        public void runOnUiThread(java.lang.Runnable command)

      • onKeyPressed

        public boolean onKeyPressed(int keyCode,
                            int repeatCount)

      • onKeyDoubleTapped

        public boolean onKeyDoubleTapped(int keyCode,
                                 int repeatCount)

      • onKeyLongPressed

        public boolean onKeyLongPressed(int keyCode,
                                int repeatCount)

      • onKeyDown

        public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                         int repeatCount)

      • onKeyUp

        public boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode,
                       int repeatCount)

      • onKeyMax

        public boolean onKeyMax(int keyCode,
                        int repeatCount)

      • isLookingAt

        public boolean isLookingAt(Entity entity)
        Check if user is looking at this entity.
        パラメータ:
        entity - Target Entity.
        戻り値:
        true if user is looking at. Otherwise false.

      • getCenterViewRotation

        public org.joml.Quaternionf getCenterViewRotation()
        Note that returned value is only valid in a frame. This object will be updated in the future at getCenterViewRotation() will be called. If you want to save this value over frames, copy it manually.
        戻り値:
        center view rotation

      • getXmlParser

        public XmlParser getXmlParser()
        Get an XmlParser.
        戻り値:
        XmlParser

      • createXmlParser

        protected XmlParser createXmlParser(android.content.Context context)
        Instantiate XmlParser. Called at first time with getXmlParser().
        パラメータ:
        context - context
        戻り値:
        new instance of XmlParser.

      • setSceneFromXmlAsset

        public Scene setSceneFromXmlAsset(java.lang.String assetName)

      • setSceneFromXml

        public Scene setSceneFromXml(java.lang.String uri)

      • setSceneFromXml

        public Scene setSceneFromXml(int xmlRes)

      • setSceneFromXml

        public Scene setSceneFromXml(java.io.File file)

      • animate

        public void animate(@NonNull
                    android.animation.Animator anim,
                    @Nullable
                    java.lang.Runnable endCallback)
        Run Animator on UI thread and notify end callback on GL thread.
        パラメータ:
        anim - Animator.
        endCallback - Callback for animation end. This is not called when animation is canceled. If you require more complicated callbacks, use AnimatorListener instead of this.

      • cancel

        public final void cancel(@NonNull
                         android.animation.Animator anim,
                         @Nullable
                         java.lang.Runnable callback)
        Cancel Animator running.
        パラメータ:
        anim - Animator.
        callback - Callback for canceling operation was called in UI thread.

      • onHmdMounted

        public void onHmdMounted()

      • onHmdUnmounted

        public void onHmdUnmounted()

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        This is called when Activity is resumed. Note that it is called on Android's main thread. If you do something with GL related tasks, use runOnGlThread(Runnable).

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        This is called when Activity is paused. Note that it is called on Android's main thread. If you do something with GL related tasks, use runOnGlThread(Runnable).

      • recenterYaw

        public void recenterYaw(boolean showBlack)
